settings.title: Lab Created Diamond Engagement Rings
settings.subheading: Finding your soulmate may be challenging, but shopping for an engagement ring should be effortless.

settings.text: 2 Ways to Make Your Forever Ring

settings.heading: Shop Our Signature Styles
settings.description:
To create your ring, start by selecting a setting that suits your style. Next, choose a lab-grown diamond to complete the design. You can then personalize the ring with an engraving to make it truly unique. Finally, review all your choices and complete your ring.

settings.heading: Create Your Own Design
settings.description:
We offer completely custom engagement rings, allowing you to showcase your unique style. Share your ideas with us, and our expert team will collaborate with you to turn your vision into reality.

GET STARTED TODAY

settings.heading: 2. Create a Custom Engagement Ring
settings.description:
BECOME THE DESIGNER

Customize Your Engagement Ring

We offer fully customized engagement rings to give you more choice and the ability to express your individuality. Work exclusively with our in-house gemologists who will help you create a truly customized engagement ring.

settings.code:
SEE OUR DESIGN PROCESS

Create Your Unique Engagement Ring

We proudly specialize in designing and creating unique diamond engagement rings. Our team of in-house gemologists and designers adhere to the strictest quality control and attention to precise detail to ensure your dream ring becomes a reality.

Start with a setting

settings.description:
Solitaire

Discover the captivating allure of solitaire engagement rings, the epitome of classic beauty. These engagement rings for women feature a single diamond that effortlessly sparkles on its own, drawing all eyes to its mesmerizing brilliance. The simplicity of the solitaire setting allows the diamond to take center stage, showcasing its exquisite cut, clarity and carat weight.

SHOP NOW

Halo

When it comes to selecting the perfect engagement ring, a halo engagement ring is a timeless and captivating choice. This glamorous style boasts a remarkable design, featuring a single or double ring of sparkling diamond accents that encircle a center diamond, resulting in a mesmerizing halo effect. The halo diamond engagement ring effortlessly captures attention, making it an exquisite and eye-catching option for those seeking a stunning diamond engagement ring.

Shop now

Learn Morw

Lab Grown Diamonds

Lab-grown diamonds, created using advanced technology that mirrors the Earthâ€™s natural processes, share the same physical and chemical properties as mined diamonds. Offering up to 40% more affordability than their natural counterparts, these diamonds provide an ethical and sustainable option without compromising on brilliance or durability. As eco-conscious consumers increasingly seek high-quality, responsible jewelry, lab-created diamonds are becoming a popular choice. Explore the beauty of lab diamonds and embrace a radiant, sustainable future.

SHOP NOW

settings.title: How Long Does It Take to Make A Engagment Ring?
settings.text: We craft each of our rings to order with the utmost care and precision. Due to our commitment to high-quality settings and exceptional craftsmanship, it typically takes 3-4 weeks to complete each ring.

settings.title: How Do I Know My Ring Size?
settings.text: To find the right engagement ring size, consider factors like the ring's width and potential finger fluctuations due to temperature and humidity. Seek advice from family or friends who know the recipient's size or use a plastic ring sizer or printable guide at home. Methods include measuring with string or paper and comparing it to a ring sizing chart. While these DIY methods can provide estimates, it's wise to confirm the size with a jeweler before purchasing. Reputable jewelers often offer free resizing services post-purchase for added convenience.

settings.title: Can I create a Custom Setting Not Offered?
settings.text: Certainly! You have the exciting opportunity to design your own engagement ring. Start by selecting a setting that catches your eye, and then choose the ideal diamond to match. If you already have a specific design in mind, simply share a photo with us, and our team will guide you through the process of creating your dream engagement ring. We're here to assist you in crafting a truly unique and personalized symbol of your love.

settings.title: I Have A Deadline. Can You Rush A Ring?
settings.text: Certainly! We offer rush services for certain rings. Please email us so that we can ensure we meet your deadline.
